E1.name: Total Electricity Consumption
E1.definition: Total electricity from grid and captive power

E2.name: Total Fuel Consumption
E2.definition: Energy from all fuel sources consumed on-site
E2.calculation: Coal + natural gas + diesel + other fuels

E3.name: Total Energy Consumption
E3.definition: Sum of all energy sources consumed

E4.name: Energy Intensity
E4.definition: Energy consumed per unit of revenue or production
E4.calculation: Total energy consumption / production or revenue

E5.name: Renewable Energy Share
E5.definition: Fraction of total energy from renewable sources

W2.name: Water Intensity
W2.definition: Water consumed per unit of revenue or production
W2.calculation: Total water consumption / production or revenue

W3.name: Water Recycled and Reused
W3.definition: Volume of water recycled or reused on-site

W4.name: Water Discharge
W4.definition: Total wastewater discharged to external bodies

WS3.name: Waste Directed to Disposal
WS3.definition: Waste sent to landfill or incineration
